Project Description
MediaBrowser WPF is a small application designed with WPF in an educational purpose.
This application allows you to consult a series of media (Movies, Albums, Images, Books) and to administer them.

This software provides simple functionalities, but allows to approach many of concept related to WPF like the methodology MVVM.

Future developments :
  • Upgrade to Visual Studio 2010
  • Change the main directory of medias
  • Improve performance

This project was designed with :
  • Mvvmhelpers developed by Mark Smith (Julmar Technology)
  • ElementFlow (FluiKit)
  • WpfBookControls developed by Mitsu Furuta (Microsoft France).
  • Unity
  • Visual Studio 2008
  • DotNet Framework 3.5
  • Expression Blend 3

Hardware Requirements :
  • At least 2GB memory
  • Dual Core CPU of at least 2GHz
  • A graphics card with at least 256MB memory => Important !
  • At least 1GB of free hard disk space
  • Windows Vista / Windows 7

IMPORTANT : The application must be run in a directory with all access rights
